scripts.build-prod: npm install && npm run set-up && npm run build
scripts.remove-hero-resources: rm -rf heroes-talents && rm -rf src/resources/hero && rm -rf src/resources/images/heroes && rm -rf src/resources/images/talents
scripts.set-up: npm run remove-hero-resources && git clone https://github.com/heroespatchnotes/heroes-talents.git && mv heroes-talents/hero src/resources && mv heroes-talents/images/* src/resources/images && rm -rf heroes-talents && npm run generate-data
